step.name: README
step.action: tsenv.exe "README=This task sequence demonstates how to set variables for retrying connection to the management point or distribution point. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/configmgr/osd/understand/task-sequence-variables for more information." /hiddenflag:False

defaultVarList.variable: This task sequence demonstates how to set variables for retrying connection to the management point or distribution point. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/configmgr/osd/understand/task-sequence-variables for more information.

group.name: Set Management Point & Download variables
group.description: Set these in cases where network connection may be poor to retry connections to the management point.

step.name: SMSTSMPListRequestTimeout=120000 miliseconds
step.description: Specify how many milliseconds a task sequence waits before it retries to install an application after it fails to retrieve the management point list from location services. By default, the task sequence waits 60 seconds before it retries the step 3 times

step.name: SMSTSDownloadRetryCount=5
step.description: Controls the number of times that Configuration Manager attempts to download content from a distribution point. By default, the client retries 2 times.

step.name: SMSTSDownloadRetryDelay=15
step.description: Controls the number of seconds that Configuration Manager waits before it retries to download content from a distribution point. By default, the client waits 15 seconds before retrying.
